Home / Interviews / Interviews by Conference / SCNA 2013

SCNA 2013

SCNA 2013 brings together 10 interviews from 2013. Recurring themes include community building and user-group organizing, conference speaking and presentation skills, and Clojure and functional programming. Featured interviewees include Adewale Oshineye, Amitai Schlair, Angelique Martin, and Chet Hendrickson.

  • Coverage: 10 interviews from 2013.
  • Featured interviewees: Adewale Oshineye, Amitai Schlair, Angelique Martin, Chet Hendrickson, and Dave "pragdave" Thomas.
  • Common themes: community building and user-group organizing, conference speaking and presentation skills, Clojure and functional programming, developer education and learning, and open source and project maintenance.

Trusted Sources

  • https://web.archive.org/web/20131113054045/http://scna.softwarecraftsmanship.org/

Notable Contributors

  • Sandro Mancuso — Co-founder of the London Software Craftsmanship community. Focus: Software craftsmanship practice, mentoring, and engineering standards. Interview
